title: My google pixel 3Xl screenlight is changing to an yellow tint as I move the brightness to above 80%!
content: My google pixel 3Xl white light brightness is turning into yellow tint as the slide the brightness over 80% - 100% This is happening  from after I restored the phone to factory settings. I checked the following settings as advised in other blog posts - Night mode is not on. Tried moving the display to Natural from Adaptive. Still doesnâ€™t work.
